se.mattec.id2212.project.view

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.mattec.id2212.project.view.UserManager

  • @Named(value="userManager")
public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A manager linking between the JSF user interface and the application logic in UserBean.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserManager()
      Creates the UserManager with login status initiated to false.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getLoginError()
      Returns the error message string for the login view.
      java.lang.String getRegisterError()
      Returns the error message string for the register view.
      boolean isIsLoggedIn()
      Returns if the user is logged in or not.
      boolean isIsLoggedInAsAdmin()
      Returns if the user is logged in as an admin or not.
      void login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Tries to log in to the web shop.
      void logout()
      Logs the current user out by resetting the login status.
      void register(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, boolean isAdmin)
      Tries to register a new user with the web shop.

      • login

        public void login(java.lang.String username,
         java.lang.String password)
        Tries to log in to the web shop.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to log in with.
        password - The password to validate.

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password,
            boolean isAdmin)
        Tries to register a new user with the web shop.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to register.
        password - The password to go with the account.
        isAdmin - If the user is admin or not.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Logs the current user out by resetting the login status.

      • isIsLoggedInAsAdmin

        public boolean isIsLoggedInAsAdmin()
        Returns if the user is logged in as an admin or not.
        Returns:
        True if user is an admin, false otherwise.

      • isIsLoggedIn

        public boolean isIsLoggedIn()
        Returns if the user is logged in or not.
        Returns:
        True if user is logged in, false otherwise.
